title: Like ordinary children
brief_description: Focuses on a school in Kent which is for handicapped children. This film is seen through the eyes of the handicapped children themselves, in particular, those with spinal injuries. Also describes the opinions of the older children from the senior school towards the handicapped children. Colorful and informative.
